overview: Virtual artist Kizuna AI to hold her solo concert for the first time in two years online. This concert will be an xR live performance aiming to fuse the real and virtual world. The world changed dramatically in 2020, and with this change happening, people's lifestyles have taken a major turn with everything becoming "virtual." In such a chaotic time, Kizuna AI being a virtual existence will bring a new type of "live performance" that will bring hope and light to humanity.
title: Kizuna AI 2nd Live "hello, world 2020"
